settings.section_subtitle: See how industry professionals advance their careers with AAI's comprehensive safety education programs.
settings.cta_description: Join thousands of professionals who have advanced their careers with AAI

settings.panel_description: Experience our cutting-edge simulation technology that puts you in real amusement park scenarios. Practice safety procedures, emergency responses, and operational protocols in a risk-free environment.
settings.feature_list: Real-world scenarios|Interactive simulations|Instant feedback|Progress tracking|Virtual equipment training

settings.tab_description: Learn anywhere, anytime on any device
settings.panel_description: Access your courses from any device with our mobile-optimized platform. Continue your professional development during breaks, commutes, or downtime.
settings.feature_list: Mobile responsive|Offline access|Sync across devices|Touch-friendly interface|Download for offline

settings.panel_description: Complete courses and earn certifications recognized throughout the amusement industry. Build your professional portfolio with credentials that employers value.
settings.feature_list: IAAPA recognized|Digital certificates|Continuing education credits|Career advancement|Employer verification
